synopsis.text: Spy x Family follows the lives of the Forger family, who seem like an ordinary family on the outside but each hide major secrets. The father, Loid Forger, is actually Twilight, an elite spy carrying out a top-secret mission known as Operation Strix. His wife Yor works as an assassin under the alias Thorn Princess. Unbeknownst to Loid and Yor, their adopted psychic daughter Anya knows their true identities. Loid's mission, Operation Strix, aims to secure peace and prevent war between two rival nations. To succeed, Loid must get close to a key political figure by blending into the elite social circles. Hence he creates the fa√ßade of a loving family. Anya plays a pivotal role, using her mind-reading abilities to help Loid while also enjoying the warmth of a caring family. The Forgers live amusing adventures balancing their spy and family lives. Between foiling baddies and helping Anya make friends, Loid strives to be a model husband to Yor. But keeping secrets from an assassin wife has its hilarious hurdles. Still, the bonds of love and trust between the Forgers grow deeper. With the key to international peace resting on their success as undercover spies, the Forgers immerse themselves fully into their family act.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
